function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close contact between service providers and customers through personal interactions and shared personal information","Impact":"Increased risk of transmitting contagious diseases between service providers and customers","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and reduce direct physical contact between service providers and customers","Technologies":"Sensors for contactless payment, online ordering systems, and delivery services","People":"Service providers, customers","Owner":"Business owners, service providers"},{"Description":"Sharing personal and family information with customers","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy and increased personalization of service encounters, increasing the likelihood of close personal interactions","Mitigation":"Obtain consent before sharing personal information, and limit personalization to avoid close personal interactions","Technologies":"Privacy protection tools for social media, data protection measures, and customer consent management systems","People":"Service providers, customers","Owner":"Business owners, service providers"}]}
